Document.name: FindFirst
Document.summary: Find the first position that the sub string appears in a text.
Document.returns: Returns a pair of numbers, the first number indicating the position in the text, the second number indicating the size of the equivalence sub string in the text. For some normalization, the found sub string may be binary different to the string you want to find.
Document.param: The text to find the sub string.
Flags controlling how to normalize a string.
